Architecture Diagram

        graph TD
    A[Users] --> B[Voice Chat API]
    B --> C[Azure Kubernetes]

    C --> E[Polygon Blockchain]
    F[Grafana] -->|Monitor| C & E
    G[GitHub Actions] -->|CI/CD| C & D
